title: Digestive Enzymes with Makzyme-Pro & Probiotics | Advanced Enzyme Supplement for Digestive Health, Bloating Relief & Nutrient Absorption | Bromelain, Papain, Lipase - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Digestive Enzymes with Makzyme-Pro - Complete Digestive Support

Enhance your digestive health with our Digestive Enzymes with Makzyme-Pro™, a comprehensive enzyme and probiotic formula designed to support optimal digestion, reduce bloating, and improve nutrient absorption. This advanced blend combines powerful digestive enzymes with beneficial probiotics for complete digestive wellness.

Key Benefits

  • Complete Digestive Support: Breaks down proteins, fats, carbohydrates, and lactose for optimal digestion
  • Reduces Bloating & Gas: Alpha Galactosidase helps digest complex carbohydrates that cause gas and discomfort
  • Improves Nutrient Absorption: Enhanced enzyme activity ensures your body absorbs maximum nutrients from food
  • Lactose Intolerance Support: Lactase enzyme (600 LACU) helps digest dairy products
  • Probiotic Blend: Contains beneficial bacteria (L. acidophilus, L. casei, L. plantarum) for gut health
  • Natural Anti-Inflammatory: Bromelain and Papain support digestive comfort and reduce inflammation

Powerful Enzyme Complex

  • Makzyme-Pro™ (400mg): Proprietary enzyme blend with 2500 HUT activity for superior protein digestion
  • Fungal Protease: Breaks down proteins into amino acids for better absorption
  • Bromelain (90 GDU): Pineapple-derived enzyme that aids protein digestion and reduces inflammation
  • Papain (2670 TU): Papaya enzyme that supports protein breakdown and digestive comfort
  • Fungal Lipase (1500 FIP): Breaks down fats and supports healthy fat metabolism
  • Fungal Lactase (600 LACU): Helps digest lactose for those with dairy sensitivity
  • Alpha Galactosidase (300 GALU): Reduces gas and bloating from beans, vegetables, and whole grains
  • Probiotic Strains: L. acidophilus, L. casei, and L. plantarum support gut flora balance

Who Should Use This Supplement?

Perfect for individuals experiencing:

  • Bloating, gas, or indigestion after meals
  • Lactose intolerance or dairy sensitivity
  • Difficulty digesting proteins, fats, or carbohydrates
  • Nutrient absorption issues
  • IBS or digestive discomfort
  • Age-related digestive enzyme decline

Suggested Use: Take 1 veggie capsule with each meal or as directed by your healthcare provider.

Quality Assurance: Made with premium enzymes and probiotics. Vegetarian capsules. No artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Support optimal digestion with Digestive Enzymes featuring Makzyme-Pro™ and probiotics. Advanced formula with Bromelain, Papain, Lipase, and Lactase reduces bloating, improves nutrient absorption, and supports gut health. 60 veggie capsules.
